entities.description: Indicates if respondent has ever used any prescription tranquilizer in a way a doctor did not direct.
Recoded variable indicating the most recent tranquilizer misuse.
Indicates if respondent is a past year initiate for any tranquilizer misuse.
Age at first misuse of a tranquilizer for respondents who misused tranquilizers in the 12 months prior to being interviewed.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has ever used a prescription tranquilizer in a way a doctor did not direct.
Describes the recoded variable that indicates the most recent tranquilizer misuse among respondents.
Describes whether the respondent is a past year initiate for any tranquilizer misuse.
Specifies the age at first misuse of a tranquilizer for those who misused tranquilizers during the past year.
